excerpt: This guide shows how to install four components of Elastic Stack - Filebeat, Metricbeat, Elasticsearch, and Kibana - to monitor a typical NGINX webserver.
linkTitle: Monitoring NGINX Using the Elastic Stack on Centos 7

excerpt: Elasticsearch supports a wide variety of plugins which enable more powerful search features. Learn how to manage, install, and use them.
